Please enjoy this work that features new challenges in various parts.\"","fr":"C'est l'histoire d'un monde qui se divise en millions de petits mondes infinis, comme dans un thème classique de la science fiction : les mondes parallèles. Bien que des histoires de mondes parallèles ont été écrites à travers de nombreux médiums, La Princesse du Château sans Fin propose une nouvelle manière de montrer ces mondes superposés, par le prisme du château médiéval, symbole de la puissance des shoguns. On y retrouve les éléments forts des mangas de Kago : virtuosité de la composition, sexe grotesque et gore, réécriture d'événements historiques, dessins et décors totalement fous. No ensino médio, acabam na mesma turma, e quando Ame percebe que Umi está tendo dificuldades para se adaptar, decide ajudá-la. Esse pequeno gesto faz com que os dois comecem, aos poucos, a se aproximar."},"links":{"al":"182629","bw":"series/515656/list","mal":"175840","raw":"https://jumpsq.shueisha.co.jp/rensai/ametoumi/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

However, when he comes to, he finds himself face-to-face with a young Seraphina! Astonishingly, he has returned to being his 13-year-old self. Seeing Seraphina before she became a villainess, Arvel makes a resolution: he will raise her to become a proper person and save his own life.\n\nTo start, he begins searching for a way to prevent the death of his brother, Sho, who was once engaged to Seraphina. However, the situation is far from simple, as he must contend with Seraphina’s neglectful family, men vying for the beautiful Seraphina’s attention, and a web of conflicting intentions.\n\nIn this journey through time, can Arvel alter Seraphina’s fate and save her from becoming a villainess…!?"},"links":{"al":"187352","ap":"akujo-kyousei-keikaku","mal":"177702","mu":"cbv6don","raw":"https://comic-growl.com/series/40fc2e7eab7c6/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"d14322ac-4d6f-4e9b-afd9-629d5f4d8a41","name":{"en":"Villainess"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

The show then proceeds to follow the ups and downs of their \"fake relationship\" which eventually blossoms into a real relationship, but not without the usual problems of jealousy and insecurities that come with dating.\n\n2gether is an adaptation of JittiRain's Phro Rao Khu Kan novel series."},"links":{"al":"125117","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B09MD7JNX6?binding=kindle_edition\u0026ref_=dbs_s_ks_series_rwt_tkin\u0026qid=1736026933\u0026sr=1-4","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/638569/","mal":"136689","mu":"mdvnja5"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f42fbf9e-188a-447b-9fdc-f19dc1e4d685","name":{"en":"Music"}}]}
